function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on telemedicine for diagnosis and treatment","Impact":"Limited access to medical care and resources","Mitigation":"Diversification of medical care access points, use of alternative communication technologies","Technologies":"Telemedicine, alternative communication technologies","People":"Patients, medical staff","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government health departments"},{"Description":"Mental health impact during lockdown","Impact":"Psychological trauma and boredom","Mitigation":"Provision of immersive entertainment and psychotherapy through 5G-based VR/AR technologies","Technologies":"5G-based VR/AR technologies","People":"Quarantined individuals","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals"}]}
